data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Luton with the kick-off.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Joao Pedro.
In the minute 45, John Brooks blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has commenced. Watford with the kick-off.
Jordan Clark is on a sub for Elliott Lee for Luton.
In the minute 63, Tom Dele-Bashiru is replacing Nathaniel Chalobah for the home team.
Nathan Jones is making the team's second substitution at Vicarage Road with Danny Hylton replacing James Collins.
Matty Pearson for Luton has been booked by John Brooks and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 78, The away team replace Ryan Tunnicliffe with Kazenga LuaLua.
Watford make their second substitution with Troy Deeney replacing Joao Pedro.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-0.
Vladan Ivic (Watford) is making a third substitution, with Domingos Quina replacing Ismaila Sarr.
Rhys Norrington-Davies (Luton) has received a first yellow card.
